bibl.title: New Archaeology at Ancient Scetis. Surveys and Initial Excavations at the Monastery of St. John the Little in the Wādī al-Natrūn.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Archaeological and geophysical surveys. - Excavation of a monastic midden. - Excavation in 2007, subsequent excavations, and future research plans.
bibl.seg: Darlene Brooks Hedstrom, Stephen J. Davis, Tomasz Herbich, Salima Ikram, Dawn McCormack, Marie-Dominique Nenna & Gillian Pyke, New Archaeology at Ancient Scetis. Surveys and Initial Excavations at the Monastery of St. John the Little in the Wādī al-Natrūn.
Introduction. - Archaeological and geophysical surveys. - Excavation of a monastic midden. - Excavation in 2007, subsequent excavations, and future research plans.
Brooks Hedstrom Davis Herbich Ikram McCormack Nenna Pyke
